projectList.title: Eduverse 3.0
projectList.description: Junior Software Developer at a startup aimed at creating a browser based game which rewards players with NFT's linked to real-life prizes. Proceeds from prizes are to be donated to charity organizations.

projectList.title: Spotify Artist Collaboration Web
